note:
The Pedestrian and Bicycle Information Center is funded by @USDOT to promote a safe, accessible, and equitable transportation system for all. We offer webinars, resources, training, and more!

alt-text for profile image: three white overlapping circles that each have a different icon for a person walking, a bicycle, and the letter "i," all over a green background.
alt-text for banner image: Two people cross the street in a marked crosswalk next to three bicyclists using bike crossings.
